title: Design Thinking-based Practical Problem-solving Education for Pre-service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and instructional methodology understanding
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies to solve real-world educational problems using design thinking methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve real educational environment problems following the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Learners can develop three or more creative educational solutions through team-based collaboration.
Learners can prototype using digital tools and submit improved designs reflecting feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
